name: 5 mazes
description:
The current program version is 5 mazes v1.0 with the latest changes dated 2023-02-27.

Controls

Start the game: Enter

Movement: arrows or WASD

Interact/confirm dialog: Alt, Z or J

Game

Get through five consecutive mazes, each one larger and more difficult.

Credits

Game idea and GB Studio magic: godai.

Mazes generated with maze generating algorithm by Meijer.

Music tracks by AJ Booker.
